# dplyr package presentation

## 多行并一行

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(openxlsx)
expr <- read.xlsx("./工作簿1.xlsx")
expr
expr %>% 
  group_by(id) %>% 
  summarise(across(everything(), \(.x) paste(.x, collapse = ";")))
```
